meta_title: Maison Sunny Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper - 100% Cotton, Handmade in Sri Lanka
meta_description: Shop the Maison Sunny Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper. Made with 100% soft cotton, this handmade romper is perfect for special occasions or everyday wear. Button closure for easy changing. Available in sizes 0-3m, 9-12m, 12-18m, and 18-24m.
product_description:
The Maison Sunny Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper is a cherished keepsake for any baby. Carefully handmade from 100% soft cotton, this romper offers exceptional comfort and a timeless design. The delicate details and beautiful shade make it perfect for special occasions like birthdays, parties, and weddings, or simply for a delightful day out with family and friends. 

This romper is ethically made by skilled artisan women in Colombo, Sri Lanka, and your purchase directly supports their work and empowers their community.  It features a convenient button closure for easy changing and is machine washable for your convenience. 

This limited-edition, small-batch romper is a testament to quality craftsmanship and sustainable practices. Give your little one the gift of comfort and style with the Maison Sunny Ahoy Little Sailor Baby Romper.
key_features: ["PREMIUM 100% COTTON: Crafted from soft, breathable 100% cotton, this romper ensures gentle comfort against your baby's delicate skin, perfect for all-day wear.","HANDMADE WITH LOVE:  Each romper is meticulously handmade by skilled artisans in Sri Lanka, making it a unique and special piece you'll treasure for years to come.","CONVENIENT BUTTON CLOSURE: Designed with a practical button closure, this romper allows for quick and easy diaper changes, simplifying your daily routine.","PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION: Whether it's a birthday party, a family gathering, or a casual day out, this versatile romper is the ideal choice for dressing your little one in adorable style.","SUPPORT ETHICAL PRODUCTION: Your purchase directly supports the livelihoods of talented women artisans in Sri Lanka, empowering them and their communities."]

meta_description: Celebrate your little one's 2nd birthday with this adorable Albetta bunny toy. Made with soft, snuggly fabric and featuring a hand-crocheted '2' and removable organic towelling bottoms. A perfect gift for toddlers!
product_description: Celebrate your little one's second birthday with the adorable Albetta 2nd Birthday Bunny Toy. This charming plush bunny is crafted from a soft, snuggly fabric, ensuring a comforting feel for your child. Its top features a hand-crocheted number '2', adding a unique and personalized touch. The bunny also sports cute matching organic towelling bottoms that are fully removable, allowing for imaginative play and easy cleaning. Standing at 32 cm tall, this bunny is the perfect size for cuddling and play. Give the gift of snuggles and celebrate this special milestone with the Albetta 2nd Birthday Bunny Toy.

meta_title: Albetta Crochet Bunny Rattle Toy | Hand-Crocheted Baby Gift | 100% Cotton
meta_description: Delight your little one with the Albetta Crochet Bunny Rattle Toy. Hand-crocheted from 100% cotton, this adorable bunny features a sweet striped top and floppy ears. Safe from birth and a perfect baby shower gift.
product_description:
Introducing the charming Albetta Crochet Bunny Rattle Toy, a delightful companion for newborns and infants. This beautifully crafted rattle is lovingly hand-crocheted from top-quality cotton, ensuring a soft and gentle touch against delicate skin. Its sweet striped top and cute floppy ears add to its irresistible appeal, making it a cherished gift for any new parent.

This bunny rattle is not only adorable but also safe for babies from birth, thanks to its CE/UK tested certification.  The soft, plush bunny is filled with 100% polyester stuffing, providing a comforting texture for little hands to explore. The gentle rattling sound stimulates auditory development and encourages interaction.  It's the perfect size for small hands to grasp and hold, promoting fine motor skills development as they play.

This Albetta bunny rattle coordinates perfectly with other Albetta farm collection items, allowing you to create a cohesive and charming nursery theme.  Give the gift of comfort, cuteness, and developmental play with this exquisite hand-crocheted bunny rattle.
